src/main/docx/elements/Heading.ts.description: DOCX element converters use functions that take MarkdownElement and ThemeData, return docx Paragraph objects. Font sizes in docx are in half-points (multiply points by 2). Spacing uses DXA units (20 DXA = 1 point). Colors must strip the '#' prefix. Use HeadingLevel enum constants, not strings.

src/main/docx/elements/List.ts.description: List element converter returns an array of Paragraphs (one per item) rather than a single element. Uses manual bullet/number prefixes with TextRun instead of built-in Word numbering API. Indentation is handled via left indent with hanging indent for proper text wrapping. 15pt base indent + 20pt per nesting level.
